resources.string: Take a Survey and get \nFree Beer.
I would like to sign up to receive email updates from Bet4Beer and selected partners
I can confirm i have read and accepted the Bet4Beer terms & conditions

Open a sports betting account with BETMGM and deposit $10 to receive 10 additional Bets4Beers tokens. Once you have completed registration and made your $10 deposit send us a screenshot so we can verify that it has been done and we\'ll release the final 10 Bet4Beer tokens. Bosh. It\'s as easy as that. \n\nRefer a friend to Bets4Beers and receive 2 MORE tokens!

Welcome to Bet4Beer.

The app that gives you
FREE foods and drink
in exchange for answering questions about your betting preferences.
Easy as pie!
We\'re glad you love our app! Now please rate us in the app store!
We\'re sorry you\'re experiencing problems with our app, we promise to address the issues you experienced as quickly as possible.
Thanks for responding to our survey!
Unlock all three tiers to receive 14 tokens worth $84!\n\nExchange tokens for FREE food and drinks at the bar - it\'s as easy as that.

Aww snap. if you\'re not interested in gambling either now or in the future, then Bet4Beer isn\'t one for you.\n\nBut have a cold one on us anyway - just scan this QR code at the bar - as a thanks for downloading our app.

Great job! You've completed Tier 3.

Your account has automatically been updated with 10 token, worth $60.

Exchange token at bar for FREE food or drink.
Sorry! You image isn\'t approved. \n\n Goodbye!

Bosh!\nGreat job. Thanks for submitting your screenshot.\nOne of the team will be in touch quicker than you can say, "make mine a cold one" to confirm the 10 additional tokens have been added to your account.
Want free tokens?\nSimply refer a friend to try Bet4Beer and we will credit your account with one free token worth $8 for every new sign up.\nShare your unique invite code.

Great job! You've completed Tier 1.

Your account has automatically been updated with 1 token, worth $6.

Exchange token at the bar for FREE food or drinks.

Great job! You've completed Tier 2.

Your account has automatically been updated with 3 tokens, worth $18.

Exchange tokens at the bar for FREE food and drinks.
